extendedInfo.description: Addictive game which develops your logical and tactical thinking."Be A King of The Color Kingdom In The Extremely New Puzzle Game! - AppEggs.com""Immediately after I made sense of this game I knew that I was hooked on it. It's a wonderful staple game to have on hand." - www.androidrundown.com (score: 9/10)"It's a lot more fun and addictive than it might sound; give it a try! -- Keoni C." - http://www.bestappsmarket.com"Quadratum: Psychedelic multiplayer color fun!" - http://www.androidgamesreview.com (Rating: 4/5) Quadratum is a puzzle game, the goal is to occupy more squares than your rival. The occupation of squares is realized per consecutive joining of squares which are next to the player. Complication is that your rival has the same goal. You have 6 types of bonuses scattered all over the field. Use them at the right moment.Have fun!Buy the full version to get more features!Characteristics and features:- Single and multiplayer mode - by multiplayer mode synchronous play of 2 players on one appliance- 3 difficulty levels- different levels collected to tournament- levels with blockades - 6 types of bonuses- 6 profiles of players- game stats- nice graphics - app2sd - no adsSubstantiation of necessary permissions:Access to a flash card is necessary for record profiles and statistics of players. For this purpose will be created a folder 'Quadratum' on a flash card.We search people who can help us to translate this description to other (your) language! if you can help, please, contact us via email.BETA! This version intends for checkout of game, so write your comments and suggestions by email: machaon.studio@gmail.comkw: addictive, flood, color, brain, logic, puzzle, strategy, AI, coloroid, fill, filler, cool, multiplayer, tegra, libgdx, tegra, tablet, buzzdoes

reviews.title: Superb App
reviews.comment: Could have been more responsive.  Very vibrant and addictive. Especially the multi-player modes.  -Asus TF700T  *It deserves a five. There will always be room for improvements.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Super fun!
reviews.comment: Great game. Tough to master. My 11 year old plays it all the time!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great Game.... but,
reviews.comment: The concept is great, but the response to my touches is so annoyingly slow that it is unplayable. If it responded when I touched it I would play this game a lot. 3 stars for the concept but thats the best I can do until playability is improved.
reviews.author: Kevin Drake

reviews.title: Fun flood
reviews.comment: Flood game with fun twists.
